replies.body: I remember seeing a suggestion 3 years ago in the old champ select  about filtering champions by lane and role, finally Riot actually implements it. Well done

you could filter by typing marksman into the search box. roles have been filterable for ages.

Sorting of position. yes.
sorting of mastery xp. yes.
sorting of hextech chests earnt. yes.
these were my ideas that i posted in the forums.
thankyou for listening riot!

- Would be nice to be able to set your own champs for the lane filter.
- Filter by favourites instead of just an icon
- Interactive Non Ranked Lane selection map, so there are no arguments.
- possible blocking of chat until all members have joined the chat, to avoid conflicts over roles.
- Automatic focus on the chat input box. So no more click type.

Other than that, good work :D

> [{quoted}](name=shadowblade299,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=rbE6EjFM,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2017-09-27T08:06:31.217+0000)
>
> I main supp and get frustrated too but the grading system not only considers your kda but even how many ward you use.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

how do you get frustrated by that? If you're not warding, you're not doing your role as a support. if you're KDA is low, you have the wrong type of support for your team composition, or engaging when you should be peeling, etc.

What I hate about the grading system is it doesn't take into account fed lane overflow. Can have a perfect kda for 20 minutes, but when that fed top laner starts getting around the map it drops to 3 or 1 or something. As a support you notice you could go top with jg and help pull it back a bit after 2 kills maybe,  but that requires coordinated efforts that you just don't get in solo queue, and if you do, the adc will play as though you are there and feed, then blame you for not being there.

It's a hard life, but ya gotta suck it up sometimes. Not to mention that even as a support, it takes the champ you are playing and incorporates CS. So if you're playing a morg or karma etc, which can also mid or top with some tank support options, your grade is less, because you have no CS.

If you're the support role, CS should never be a factor in your grade.

That said had a fun darius game as support yesterday, went 1 1 3 with only 37 CS and got an A so....
You have to buy sightstone and my adc flames me for not shielding and then if i buy supp items (eg locket) they flame me for not warding...
